ivory.bloomir.data

Class Bits

  • java.lang.Object
    • ivory.bloomir.data.Bits
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Writable

    public class Bits
extends Object
implements Writable
    Bits is a bit-packet abstraction, containing a number of bits inside an int array for efficiency
    Author:
    Nima Asadi
